meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable and experienced in matters of sex and relationships.
meanings.sent1: The sexpert provided valuable advice on improving intimacy in relationships.
meanings.sent2: I consulted a sexpert to learn more about healthy sexual practices.
meanings.sent3: The sexpert's tips on spicing up date nights were both helpful and amusing.
meanings.sent4: She was a true sexpert, able to unravel the mysteries of human relationships.
meanings.sent5: The sexpert's wisdom on communication in relationships was truly enlightening.

meanings.definition: An expert in the field of human sexuality.
meanings.sent1: The sexpert conducted groundbreaking research on human sexuality.
meanings.sent2: As a sexpert, she was well-respected in the field of human sexuality studies.
meanings.sent3: The sexpert's humorous anecdotes about human sexuality always entertained her audience.
meanings.sent4: He was a sexpert in unraveling the complexities of human sexuality.
meanings.sent5: The sexpert's insights into human sexuality were highly sought after by researchers.
